document.full_text: initial fears that a later date on the pga tour schedule would weaken the field for the heritage this week have proved unfounded with seven of the world's top 20 set to take part.
document.title: heritage draws strong field, despite date change
lines_and_colors: initial fears that a later date on the pga tour schedule would weaken the field for the heritage this week have proved unfounded with seven of the world's top 20 set to take part.
